### APPLICANT: CHENG ZHOU

###COVERLETTER:
###Shopify, Ottawa, ON

## Dear Kota,
I'm very excited about applying for the 'Theme Specialist' role in Shopify. As a new graduate with appreciation of art and design, passion for technology and challenges, Iâ€™m looking for an entry-level job to grow and refine my skills in technical field, and improve my customer services skills while working with clients and talented professionals in industry. I hold strong interest in web template modifying/creating, and I am eager to learn and kick start my career in web design area. Web design opens a brand new era for me, I got to know HTML,CSS and JavaScript a month ago, and I'm totally get addicted to it. I believe Shopify would be an ideal place for me to learn and grow, and to create and customize beautiful and special eCommerce website themes for every customer.

I'm flexible, quick to pick up new knowledge, new skills, new software and eager to learn from others. I am also creative and enthusiastic, passionate about technology. My knowledge, experience, interpersonal skills as well as my willing to learn will prove to be a great fit for the position. Please find more details about my education background, experience and skills in my attached resume, and **please visit my web design and shopify shop, enjoy!**

**Yours Truly,**
**Cheng Zhou**
### HIGHLIGHTS OF QUALIFICATIONS                                             
* 	Strong interest with web design, experience of modifying web templates(Tumblr, Shopify)
*       Excellent customer service, good eye for design 
* 	Excellent learning, practice, and follow-up skills
* 	Good communication skills, a self-starter and a team player with collaborative spirit
* 	B.Eng degree in Electrical Engineering at McMaster University

### RELEVANT SKILLS                                                                         
* 	Web template: HTML, CSS and JavaScript(Bootstrap, jQuery) using Sublime Text, familiarity with Liquid templating
* 	Github Repository control, project management
* 	Customer Service: part time server/food runner in Spring Grill House
* 	Image and design: Adobe Photoshop, Balsamiq Mockup  
* 	Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Access etc.)
* 	Language: Native Mandarin, Intermediate Japanese (N2 Level) 

### EDUCATION                                                                      
Bachelor of Engineering, Electrical Co-op Program (with distinction)   September 2010- June 2015
McMaster University, Hamilton, ON, Canada
* 	Awarded McMaster Entrance Scholarship 
* 	Named to Dean Honor List and graduated with distinction
* 	GPA: 3.6/4.0
